QuestData.Title: Silence the Call
QuestData.Description: The Warsong clan, in their lust for dominance, have turned to the darkness of the void for power. Dark shamanism is a loathsome, dangerous practice that abuses the elemental gift I have bestowed upon them.$b$bThere is one among the Warsong that calls out the loudest to the void, an elder shaman named Kuhlrath. Slay him and the rest of his dark shaman.$b$bI will not allow the Warsong to abuse the elements and desecrate tradition.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you put an end to the Warsong ritualists?
QuestData.RewardText: The gift of shamanism is not one to be taken lightly. When the gift is abused, the elements will rise up in indignation and smite the shaman.
